nodes.description: Process B-corp CSV data and identify companies needing store location research
nodes.systemPrompt: Read the CSV data containing B-corporations. Focus on companies that operate in the Netherlands or have headquarters there. Extract company names and relevant information for store location research. Only process companies that could potentially have physical B2C stores.

nodes.description: Find physical store locations for B-corps in the Netherlands
nodes.systemPrompt: For each B-corporation, search for their physical store locations in the Netherlands. Only include B2C stores where customers can physically shop. Use web search and Google Maps to find store addresses. Skip companies that are B2B only or operate online-only.

nodes.description: Verify and format store location data
nodes.systemPrompt: Verify each found store location and format the results properly. Ensure addresses are complete and accurate. Create structured output with company name, store locations, and addresses.
